Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 54th/Cermak. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 54th/Cermak.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Clark/Division
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Clark/Division due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Clark/Division due to a door problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
